website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors with its classic styling, rugged construction, and user-friendly features.
pros: Adds a soft, feminine look to your bathroom with its fabric flowers and ruched stitchwork
Made of polyester that is both strong and soft
cons: It's an expensive choice, and it's not machine

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this shower curtain! It is most definitely imperfect, and I’m not sure how this passes any type of quality control. The seems are crooked, and looks ok like they were pulled out and sewn again. I’m not sure what happened with this curtain. This is my first review ever, but I felt so strongly about this ridiculous product that was sent to me that I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. SO CHEAPLY MADE, and the seams aren’t even straight! In the ad, it looks so beautiful. In person, it just looks awful and sad. The ruffled roses aren’t in a straight line and the curtain pulls toward the middle, so it doesn’t even completely cover the width of the shower. I’ll be returning if they accept returns!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, BUT it will pull to middle... doesn't hang straight down.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and fabric of this curtain; however, the flowers stitched across the middle pull the curtain inward. It will not hang straight, so both sides of the shower/bath show through (which is what I want to hide with a decorative curtain). I added velcro to the tub and curtain to hold the sides in place. It worked for a week, but then the pull of the curtain was too much and the velcro on the curtain pulled off completely. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: CoastLife

customer_reviews.title: Great soft, pretty look. Good buy, too
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with vintage value homezz white bathmat set. Packing on this item had it listed over $100! Felt great to get it for so much less. Lightweight enough with a clear liner added on that shower stays very bright with lights on. Some darker heavier curtains make the stall shadowy. No small kids here so white stays white. Not sure I'd opt for this cloth curtain with young kids using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: sra

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is so nice! I have gotten so many compliments from friends and family about the unique design. The fabric is soft and washes great-- it did not shrink or wrinkle. It fits perfectly around our shower and was easy to hang. I want to buy this same one but in a different color to put in our other bathroom, Such a nice product for an inexpensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shower Curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft shower curtain! It is only 1 ply, no backing, so the first day, using a fabric liner my bathroom was drenched in water! Use a quality, plastic liner & you’ll have no problems!! All in All it is beautiful, wrinkle free & made my whole bathroom look so awesome!!🥰
customer_reviews.author: suzy tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is beautiful, it washes very nice. I have washed it 3 times and it comes out bran new. The pics does not do justice to this shower curtain. For the price is even nicer. Love this shower curtain very good quality. Liz Martinez
customer_reviews.author: Liz Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this shower curtain. Very cute. Especially if u like the country/rustic style. It would qork for shabby chic too. It looks very pretty hanging there . Its normal quality ud expect. Not cheaply made and not overly thick.
customer_reviews.author: H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the top row of flowers is very off. The bottom two are both straight row of flowers. I am completely bothered by it. I love the the feminine look of the shower curtain but I can not have something so poorly made in my home.
customer_reviews.author: annakins

customer_reviews.title: Worse item I have bought on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say this was the worse purchase for me on here.
customer_reviews.author: LannaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Material is soft brushed cotton type
customer_reviews.text: Material is super soft but I wish the rosettes were finished on the edges instead of scraps of unfinished material layered to form a rose...makes the roses look cheap. A bit pricey but nice material and a nice color
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Look Great, wish they were longer, more full
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. My biggest complaint is that they aren't longer. Even after lowering my curtain rod, these hang about 6 inches off the floor. I also wish that they were more full. If I hadn't purchased 2, it would barely cover the bathtub opening. Otherwise, they are gorgeous and honestly they are just as described in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Geek

customer_reviews.title: If it had grommets this would be amazing in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews and still took a chance on this. Was delighted when it came and I saw how cute it looked... until I went to hang it up. There are NO grommets on the top and absolutely no way to actually hang this on the rod. It’s cute, shabby chic and would look great if I could actually hang it up. Not sure I’ll take a chance getting another, but I have to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Shower Curtain does not look like pictured
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain looks very expensive but the picture is deceiving The curtain I received is very cheap material and the flowerettes are made from thin stripes of material that are cut crooked before sewn. More importantly, the curtain does not fit a standard shower, its too small. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: Different top section
customer_reviews.text: The curtains are nice, the textile use is not very high quality but once the curtains are up they look very nice. My main issue with this product was that I ordered a quantity of two curtains and they were both different ; one was fora rod and the other was for hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower curtain. I got this for our newly purchased home and when I show visitors our bathroom remodel, this is the first thing people notice. It's absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Cute! As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shower curtain! I put it in our spare small bathroom and it’s made a big difference with lighting and size. Looks exactly as pictured and I didn’t have anything issues with cuts being off or it not being long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is absolutely beautiful! Reading the reviews helped me to purchase it, and I'm so happy I did! Very nice quality, and very sharp looking!! Would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: A lot cheaper than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is beautiful, however it is so bunched in areas that it creates an uneven look once it's been put up..I waited a few days for it to settle then tried pulling the bottom so that it evens out with no luck. :-(
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is so pretty! It is very light and float. I love it with a frosted liner and the white rose shower curtain hooks. It’s the perfect finishing touch for our Tiffany blue and white color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Tampakingpin

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: This product has the option of buying new or used. I picked new and paid full price. When I went to hang it up in my bathroom it was covered in hair and has black stains on the upper left quarter of it. I wouldn't be upset if I thought it was a mix-up- BUT it was sent to me in new packaging and packaged as if it was new. If I didn't know any better I would assume I was getting ripped off by paying new curtain price for a clearly used curtain. However, the curtain was pretty minus the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kris A

customer_reviews.title: Hangs Weird
customer_reviews.text: This has weird stitching so it didn't seem to fall right. I have other Lush curtains that I love, and this one was nice material and had a beautiful floral design, but it just didn't hang right.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but thin
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is beautiful, though it isn’t the highest quality. I did not expect this though, given the low price. The curtain looks great in almost any bathroom, as it’s so simple-looking yet gorgeous and traditional in its own way.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We moved to Haiti 6 months ago and I wanted something that would be nice for our tiny little home. This was a great purchase. Held up well, makes the bathroom look beautiful and stayed pretty clean. I recommend the "Clean Healthy Living Premium PEVA shower curtain liner" along with it. Perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Souza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Expected material to be of better quality. Very thin and cheap feeling however I love the style and the design of the overall curtain. Wish it were better quality, especially for the price, I expected better however it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Bisordi

customer_reviews.title: Simply pretty
customer_reviews.text: When I redid my bathroom I wanted something pretty and interesting, but not overwhelming. This gives the exact look I wanted. It's full and has detail, but doesn't overwhelm the room. So glad I waited until I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Moneypitt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little off white because that was the vibe I was getting from the photo but it is pure white. Otherwise great. Very soft. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stitching was the best quality. Really wish it would have worked out ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned! The color was more white than ivory. The stitching wasn't the best quality. Really wish it would have worked out as I love the way it looks in the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. The curtain wasn’t square. So a big triangular chunk of the shower curtain liner showed on one side. Two of the holes were not cut out to put hooks in. And one of the end holes wasn’t in the right place so a strip of shower curtain showed under the curtain. Oh and the fabric is super cheap. Plus, now returns are a hassle. Having to wait for approval so they can review it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Maragos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and delicate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delicate. One of mine had a stain but it was small and I did not have the time to return them since I was about to have guests over. They are very pretty , the most I have ever spent on shower curtains but I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fabric is easily caught on things
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out by saying this curtain is beautiful but the material it is made of already got caught on my wedding ring and it now has a small run through it. I added macrame to the bottom. I have received many compliments on it and it sure added to my bathroom country theme!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Bowman

customer_reviews.title: No hook holes - No rod opening
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty but how do you hang it!? The one I got had no hook holes and no opening for a rod or anything just a straight seam at the top! SMH!! Super annoyed!!
customer_reviews.author: TabiC75

customer_reviews.title: White flowery shower curtain delights
customer_reviews.text: I love my shower curtain. The scrunched flowers add just enough detail without being over-bearing. It is soft and the matching floral white ceramic shower hooks are the finishing detail. Perfect for me! No men in the house so I can have what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Oliver

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have not been able to get the shower/bath rod installed so I have not been able to attach the shower curtain and liner. That said I have the two set out on a bed waiting to be hung and the shower curtain is beautiful; not to prissy or overdone, just right.
customer_reviews.author: BWJ

customer_reviews.title: Just wash and hang. No ironing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. This is my 2nd one. I got nail polish on my last one. I had it for 5 years and it still looked great except the nail polish. Had to get a new one because of nail polish of course. You just wash and hang. I love that you don’t have to iron.
customer_reviews.author: acgilkin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous shabby chic!
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is beautiful. The pintucking and the little rosettes are so cute. If you like shabby chic this is the curtain for you. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanna, Lexington, Mi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had to order another because of time crunch to finish my project. The shower curtain was not correct size and hung very crooked. Thinking on my feet fast, I made curtains out of it. I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Luxurious , Great value and Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have this curtain in the upstairs bathroom, I also purchased a fabric liner to go behind it. Lush Decor absolutely describes this curtain. It is the most beautiful curtain I have ever come across and just looks beautiful. I did use a steam iron although the steam from the shower may remove the wrinkles as well. I purchased the neutral color. If you have any doubts this curtain is so luxurious and light weight material makes it an impressive touch to the current bathroom. Just Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower curtain and actually didn't take it out of the package for 2 months - I finally put it up hoping it would work because I had passed the time frame for returning it. It far exceeded my expectations - it is beautiful. I love the fabric but mostly the feminine look it has brought to my bathroom. It is very vintage and shabby chic. Really glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Used behind my bathtub to add more privacy. I loooove how this pretty shower curtain lets filtered light in, and turns a masculine bathroom into something pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing & cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material and some of the holes for shower curtain hooks were completely sewn shut so I fixed those but then I hung the shower curtain and it bunches up near the bottom making it get narrower at the bottom therefore not spanning the bathtub - looks terrible! Does not hang straight! Noticed in return directions if not in orginal package 50% restock fee so since my org packaging was thrown out before I realized poor quality of shower curtain I won't bother returning because I doubt I get much of a refund!
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: TOO WHITE!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is beautiful! The only thing I don't like is the whiteness-TOO white!! I am going to try and dye it a sandstone color from Rit dye for synthetic fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Melbar

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is a very thin material and a bright white. Not at all what I got from the picture. I will be returning this
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Curtain!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is so pretty. It has a very femine and romantic look to it. With added accessories my bathroom looks and feels very welcoming. Even my tough guy husband likes it. One suggestion, it took a long time to iron out all the wrinkles due to the placement of the roses on the curtain. I would suggest using a steamer. Steam from the shower just wouldn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ellen Self

customer_reviews.title: Bright  and cheery shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: Really cute curtain that adds a shabby chic look and lightens up my dark bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT AND ELEGANT!!! IN LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG first of all, before I even completely took it out the package, the first touch, my face was like 😳....it was sooooo SOFT!!!!!! I was contemplating whether or not I wanted to sleep with the shower curtain instead of using it for its purpose! Secondly, when I put it up, it transformed the whole look and feel of my small bathroom! I always stop and look into my bathroom with admiration now that this shower curtain is hanging up! Ugh! I just love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Bunches up on the side so half of my bathtub is showing even though the curtain is all the way over. Shaped like an upside down triangle. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but beware of coloring
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with these are beautiful. The colors are completely wrong. I tried the blush and the ivory. The blush is peach. The ivory is yellow. They are not even close. Unfortunately I had to send them both back.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Holes, not wide enough and very thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: I gave this shower curtain 2 stars because it is very pretty but not very good quality. There were numerous places that were not sewn together or uneven. The curtain did not fit my shower and looks silly. It is gather at the sides and is not wide enough for my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured, but better.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower curtain, mine does not bunch in the middle, it drapes nicely, the fabric is so soft, reminds me of a really soft cotton voile. Perfectly feminine.
customer_reviews.author: AuntiSocial

customer_reviews.title: Chic cottage look.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shower curtain. It's a true ivory. A buttery, yellow shade of ivory. I did need to steam the wrinkles out using the steam on my iron. It has a chic cottage sort of look to it. Nice and long in length. The only con to it is the holes at the top for the hooks. The first hole on each end is set in about 1.5 inches. This causes the two ends of the curtain to hang over. I suppose you could tac those ends to the liner.
customer_reviews.author: JudyH

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got the ivory shower curtain a couple months ago and I am still totally in love with it. It's so cute, so durable, and easy to clean. I was worried it was going to be too light and might show mildew stains over time but the whole thing still looks brand new. It's the perfect length but could be just a little bit wider, but still no issues there. I recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: HannahP

customer_reviews.title: I returned this shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: Was not so much the shower curtain as it was customer service, even though the shower curtain was shorter than the shower curtain it was replacing. I returned the shower curtain and made my own and it came out beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... being said I also agree that this is a beautiful shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews that is has some stubborn wrinkles but that being said I also agree that this is a beautiful shower curtain. I was looking for something to make a heavily brown bathroom look a little more feminine and this did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Finnigan

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is even prettier in person. I would highly recommend. I got the matching shower hooks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Cute farmhouse shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my guest bathroom to brighten it up and wanted to change decor. I love this shower curtain. It brightens up the bathroom and looks really cute + has the farmhouse decor look.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Soft beautiful curtain, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect shabby chic shower curtain! It adds character, good size, looks luxurious in person, the bad reviews really baffle me. I got the neutral color, looks same as pic, off white but beige and grey at the same time. Great buy! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Val Val

customer_reviews.title: Matches my bathroom perfectly - love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect - it fits with the farmhouse style and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Heiden

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love it & it's so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that this is dry lean only. We absolutely love it & it's so beautiful! Everyone who comes to our house comments on what a gorgeous shower curtain we have.
customer_reviews.author: Laura I Kebker

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this curtain in my guestbathroom. installed as soon as I got them and already got compliments! thankyou
customer_reviews.author: judy a marks

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It looks a lot better in the picture. It’s super lanky and the ivory color I picked is a lot more yellow then expected. Not happy. Looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: clayton allen

customer_reviews.title: Very feminine shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower curtain. It is thin, but it’s only for decoration. Other than it taking much longer to arrive than I expected, I really like it. It needed to be ironed, but that’s standard for most shower curtains. Super girly and perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shower curtain for my daughter's new apartment and it was just what she wanted. She first saw this item on another website but they were out of stock. I decided to take a look on Amazon and found it! My daughter was so excited to hear that I was able to order this for her and now that she is in her new place, it's the perfect accessory for her bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favoritr shower curtains ever
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Flowy. Very pretty touch for a shower. Color is accurate. Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower curtain. If you love the shabby chic look you will love this shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Must be ironed
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but you absolutely must iron or steam them. They come extremely wrinkled. A bit too transparent too. I steamed mine and got two to make less transparent. You could get a beige shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower curtain!! Looks just like the picture! I purchased it in white. Goes very well with the country chic decor I'm doing in the bathroom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. Thin fabric. Looks nice and Appears will be durable Great value for the price. Bright white clean look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute shower curtain. Lots of compliments. Just know every drop of soap or shampoo you spill will show up. I have washed it once. It wrinkled but held up well. Just rinse your hands before touching it. My son kept staining it.
customer_reviews.author: angie rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower curtain! Coordinates well with anything and good quality! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flowers!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my bathroom. It is a soft white color and is long enough to touch the ground. Good size
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Krueger

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower curtain! It's very soft and romantic and really brightened up our dark bathroom. I do feel that it's expensive for the quality that it is. The material is thin and the flowers look very fragile but I'm pleased overall with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MewMao

customer_reviews.title: Love this curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this shower curtain. I read the reviews before buying and everything the reviews said was true. It is such a pretty shower curtain. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon VA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, not as pretty as the image
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t as pretty or luxurious looking as I expected. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Natural lush
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this curtain, it's solid in color, I was under the impression it wasn't. I ordered the natural and it is a medium khaki color. Simple, timeless, unisex, farmhouse look.
customer_reviews.author: Delicia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This shower Curtain is absolutely beautiful I'm very happy with my purchase ❤
customer_reviews.author: Norma J pena

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is beautiful and brightens up our bathroom! Quality material and such a bright white color. 100% recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a children's Halloween Costume
customer_reviews.text: It is literally just a thin cheep sheet with cheep frills sewn on. This is so much worse than I could have imagined. I tried to return it, and they won't allow it. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Luann Viggiano

customer_reviews.title: Classic Design
customer_reviews.text: Love it, sort of an unusual lavender type grey but it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value. Everyone wants to know where I purchased this curtain. I ordered the square ceramic hooks to go with it that are stamped with a lace imprint. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So soft and dainty. Perfect for a classy cottage type bathroom. I returned it only because I have old tile in this bathroom and it's not white and it's not yellow, it's a funky off white and this curtain didn't look right with tile and color on walls. Wanted to keep it so badly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I just washed this for the first time and the thread snagged. Paid a good amount for something Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Still pretty.
customer_reviews.text: The “flowers aren’t the quality I was looking for and a bite different than what is shown in the main photos. I really like it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought for farmhouse look Great product for price Looks great I get many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Coulter

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-end look. I wanted something “farmhouse” but feminine. This is perfect. It is full and the rose ruching adds a very classy touch.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly love it
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a bit thing but the look is awesome. Would be happy to see this item in more of a beige color.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain was exactly what I had in mind once I began my search for one & it compliments my bathroom perfectly. The quality is great and I think it’s beautiful. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Haven't tried washing yet to see how it holds up in the dryer, but I did put it in the dryer on dewrinkle and it's fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the picture. What surprised me is how soft it is!! I would buy again in any color that's offered.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Myers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is beautiful. Was exactly what I was looking for to finish off my new bathroom remodel. I get so many compliments on it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Candy S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this shower curtain. It has exceeded my expectations. I read that some buyers were having a problem with it being wrinkled. I didn’t find it unusually wrinkled. I threw it in the dryer with a wet hand towel and it came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille M.

customer_reviews.title: They show you a different curtain then what you get!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this curtain because what I got is not what they show you. Thank es the material is thin but I don’t care about that because we use a liner but the flowers are different from what they picture and it is cheaply made they aren’t straight and then it pulls in the middle so it pulls away from the ends
customer_reviews.author: TRACEY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. The material is a little thing but for two adults it's perfect. If it was in my children's bathroom it would be stained and ripped by now. I waited until it went on sale but was money well spent. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower curtain for my daughters new apartment. I was looking for something with great quality at a reasonable price. We we both very pleased with the quality and beauty of this product! It is the centerpiece of her bathroom and she has received many compliments on it. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kappel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected. It was pretty, but the style was not what I wanted once it was delivered. I returned it for another style of shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this a couple of years ago and I still love it. It’s held up really nice and still looks so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I love this curtain. I ordered white because the color went well with wall paper and the flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It looks so elegant in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: this curtain is very unique and beautiful. My only concern is that the flowers may ravel when washed!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very pretty shower curtain. I wish there were also curtains to match.
customer_reviews.text: The item came slightly wrinkled, but was easily pressed with a steam iron. The curtain is well made and all of the florets are straight. It looks very pretty and is now the focal point of my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

product_meta.title: Lush Decor Darla Ruched Floral Bathroom Shower Curtain, 72” x 72”, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhitePretty, elegant and unique are all words that describe the Darla shower curtain. With details such as ruching and crafted flowers this is a curtain that can change the whole look of your bathroom without overwhelming it. Incredible value is another way to describe this product.
feature_bullets: Soft, 100% polyester fabric bathroom shower curtain with a delicate, cute and feminine design to enhance your space.
Pretty, elegant shower curtain with ruffled flower details covering the entire shower curtain.
Lush Décor Darla shower curtain is the ideal piece for your farmhouse style, shabby chic or vintage bathroom decor.
Measures 72 x 72 inches. Due to the delicate nature of the design, this item is dry clean only.
